Description: On I-495 at mile marker 49 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The south left shoulder and left lane are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 139 in the County of Roanoke, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 83 in the County of Henrico, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
